list.description: You can create event listener on some event, and add actions on that event. So for example you can send message in chat when someone follows your channel.

variables.userName: Name of the user who triggered the event
variables.userDisplayName: Display name of the user who triggered the event
variables.resubMonths: How many months has the user been subscribed
variables.resubStreak: How many cumulative months has the user been subscribed
variables.commandInput: Parameters of command. Example someone used '!hello world' - and world is parameters there
variables.keywordResponse: Responses of keyword, joined by space

triggerCommand: Choose command for trigger that event

operations.delay: Delay in seconds before operation executes
operations.repeat: How many times execute that operation

inputDescription.TIMEOUT: Username who will get timeout. Variables supported in that input.
